sections.content: Hey, Legends! Welcome to the first episode of Season 4 of ***[The Building Talks Podcast!](https://feeds.buzzsprout.com/1850552.rss)***

This week, I'm chatting with ***[Mick Hawes,](https://www.linkedin.com/in/mickhawes/)*** a high-performance business coach specialising in the construction industry. As a bestselling author and former elite sports coach with ***[Tennis Australia,](https://www.tennis.com.au/)*** Mick brings a unique perspective on achieving success in both business and life.

We dive into practical strategies for boosting productivity, profitability, and time management while building stronger, more effective teams. Mick also shares his insights on mindset, trust-building, and the power of daily performance rituals to help you take your career to the next levelâ€”whether you're leading a business or working your way up. Mick's ***[Builders Business Blackbelt](https://buildersbusinessblackbelt.com.au/)*** system is designed to create business success, but his advice is equally valuable for anyone striving to improve and grow in their professional life.

items: Mindset is the foundation of performance and success.
Mentoring and coaching can fast-track growth.
Small daily habits can drive long-term improvement.
Trust and empathy strengthen team and client relationships.
Asking smart questions is a game-changer for communication.
Profit management and strategy ensure business sustainability.
The PPR frameworkâ€”Preparation, Performance, and Recoveryâ€”boosts success in any role.
